name: Healthy Spinach and Artichoke Dip
ingredients: 4 cups fresh baby spinach leaves or frozen
instructions: If using fresh spinach put in big casserole dish with 1/4 cups water; cover and microwave 2 minutes.
Drain, remove excess liquid and chop.
In bowl, beat cream cheese with spoon.
Beat in mayo, 3 Tbsp parm cheese, milk, garlic and basil until well blended.
Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until heated through.
